Description: Hello and thanks for checking out another great auction from ALL_CITY_GOLD! We hope you enjoy the photos and information presented herein. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us for a prompt and friendly response. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2012 Gibson Les Paul Studio Ebony Black with Gold Hardware & OHSC Up for sale we have a 2012 Gibson Les Paul Studio in Great Working Condition. With only the occasional signs of minor wear from normal usage, behind the neck, minor buckle rash & pick guard/body wear. Despite that overall it is considered in Great Cosmetic Condition. This Les Paul is a real unique, cool & smooth sounding guitar. All electronics have been inspected/tested & are considered fully functional. 30-day return for your peace of mind. Rest assured, we are not happy until we know you are completely thrilled with your purchase. This listing includes Gibson Guitar, Owner's manual, nut adjuster, string clamp, and Hard shell case with a soft, white interior. We are doing all we can to not misrepresent anything. Any questions just ask, any comments please share, and thanks for checking out our listings!
